name: HouseKeeper of Elysium
description:
Keeper of Elysium: an honorific title assigned to a Kindred of the Camarilla to have stewardship over an Elysium, a safe space for Kindred to rest their weary bodies. 

The Beckoning: a mysterious summoning that afflicts all Elders of generations Nine and lower. 

Play as Lillia, an unbranded Thinblood hiding in plain sight as the room attendant for Hotel Alyssum. Your protector has succumbed to the Beckoning, a mysterious siren song that calls all Elders to the Middle East for reasons inexplicable, and leaves the hotel in your care until his return (if one can be so hopeful). Act quickly, clean quietly, and please do something about those “haunted” rumors. 

  • Do your best to satisfy the guests of Hotel Alyssum… just know that not every solution has a compromise. Can you trust your decision-making?
  • Build rapport and discover what makes your guests tick. Get to know them all, but you can only choose one. 
  • There has always been talk of Hotel Alyssum being home to a wraith or two… although you have never seen one. Get to the bottom of this mystery, for the answer is much closer than you think...

This is a submission to the Vampire: The Masquerade Game Jam 2022.

Credits:

Story: Lari

Writing: Lari (Giles / Howie) and Rina (Julieta / Odette)

Editing: Rina and Lari

Programming: Rina and Lari

Art: Lari

Music by Scott Buckley

Sound Effects from Zapslat.com
